title: Interpretation of a dream about booking travel in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a travel reservation in a dream: It carries many meanings that vary depending on the condition of the dreamer, so it is interpreted in the singular as a sign of the fulfillment of dreams and desires for him. Then I saw her in her dream that she had booked two tickets, good news that she will soon marry the man her heart has chosen, God willing. It is explained to the married woman when she sees her In her dream that she is booking travel tickets, this indicates that she will enjoy many good things and that they will benefit her and her family. Then the unmarried young man, when he sees in his dream that he is buying travel tickets, then his dream tells him that his marriage to the girl with whom he has been romantically linked for a long time is approaching. Interpretation A dream about booking a trip for single people A dream about booking a trip for singles has many meanings around it, and if she sees that, it indicates the presence of someone who wants to communicate with her, and that will happen soon, God willing. Seeing that she is booking train tickets is a sign of her imminent transition to a new stage in her real life, This stage is special. It brings a lot of optimism and psychological and emotional stability due to the positive changes that will be achieved at that stage. When an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is barefoot on her journey, this means that she is facing some problems. But he is on the right path to overcome these crises. Interpretation of a dream about travel tickets for a divorced woman: This divorced dream says that she is about to achieve stability and restore psychological peace in her life. Because of her wishes for success after a difficult period she went through due to her divorce from her husband. If she dreams that someone is booking tickets for her, then there is good news for her. It will She is blessed with a husband who will be hers to replace what she lacks and cause happiness to enter her heart again. Or if who does? Booking travel tickets is her ex-husband, and there is a possibility that she will return to her ex-husband after resolving the problems that led to her divorce. Losing travel tickets in a divorced woman’s dream or Tearing it apart indicates that she will be exposed to the loss of many opportunities that would help improve her conditions in her academic life. Interpretation of booking airline tickets in a dreamSee booking airline tickets in a dream, it is one of the good dreams that heralds its owner a lot of good news. Whoever travels to the Holy Land by flight In his dream, he has good news for improving circumstances. He receives good news that touches hearts, and the dreamer is also informed about his travels to perform Hajj or Umrah rituals soon, God willing. So, booking plane tickets in a dream for Gulf countries is evidence of abundant sustenance and abundance. I saw him in a dream that he is booking tickets First-class aviation with high service. In this good news, the fortuneteller has assumed one of the most famous positions and achieved a great position in the society in which he lives. Booking airline tickets in an individual’s dream. An unrelated vision. In her dream, she is booking plane tickets, indicating that she will achieve her ambitions in achieving her goals in Various areas of her life. Hence, seeing plane tickets with her name written on them is a sign that something of great value will happen in her life that will change her life for

title: Interpretation of seeing a closet in a dream and its consequences

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a wheel in a dream: The wheel is one of the important things found in every home, as it cannot be overlooked at all. It is certain that he will come up with many important interpretations and signs that will be clarified throughout this article, and the interpretation of seeing a wheel in a dream and its repercussions.Interpretation of a wheel in a dream: Many interpretations have appeared regarding this vision, as these interpretations can vary from negative to positive, as this is due to the situation. The dreamer, and these interpretations are as follows: In reality, the wheel contains a lot of clothes, so seeing it in a dream is a sign of luxury, cover, and the enjoyment of stability for whoever sees it. In fact, it also contains many books or collectibles, apart from money. And so on. The dream is considered a sign of an improved financial condition, in addition to the enjoyment of the dreamer’s material well-being. Whereas if he sees an empty closet, this may indicate that the dreamer went through a state of emotional deprivation during this period. As for seeing it disorganized inside, this indicates an abundance of thoughts And the crowding of those who saw it. In addition, the dream itself indicates the dreamer’s inability to make the right and correct decisions in his life. Also, seeing a broken wheel can indicate the dreamer’s feeling of lack of success, despair, and disappointment in that period of his life. Whereas if you see a wheel in The dream was black. It indicates the arrival of a disaster or calamity that is not an easy matter on its way to the dreamer. The closet in a dream. See also: Interpretation of seeing a closet or cupboard in a dream and its effects. Interpretation of seeing a wheel in an unmarried girl’s dream. There is no doubt that there are many interpretations that explain the meaning of this vision. For an unmarried girl, these interpretations will be presented through the following points: If there is a white wheel in an unmarried girl’s dream, this may mean that this girl will enter a phase full of joy and good news. In general, this vision indicates that this girl will receive A high and prestigious job, during which many of her goals and dreams can be achieved. Also, seeing a wardrobe full of clothes as well as jewelry. This indicates the girl’s marriage to a rich man. As for seeing an empty closet in a girl’s dream, it indicates her need for emotional attention and getting rid of the emptiness in her Her life. While mine is broken, this may indicate that this girl is linked to someone who she does not deserve and is not suitable for her either. Also, opening a wheel in a dream is considered a sign of opening many livelihoods, and God Almighty is Most High and All-Knowing. Aside from the availability of many job opportunities In the face of this girl. While if the girl tries to open a closet during her sleep, she will not succeed. This certainly symbolizes her failure to achieve a dream or goal that she may seek to achieve in her life. The closet in a dream. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about leaving the house and moving to a new house Evidence for seeing the closet for a woman Married. It should be noted that the interpretation of this vision varies depending on the factors, but also according to the dreamer’s condition, circumstances, and circumstances.

title: Interpretation of seeing dates in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a date in a dreamEveryone wants to know whether seeing dates in a dream is good or bad, and the interpretation of the dream varies depending on the color of the dates, whether red, black, or yellow. Interpretation of seeing dates in a dream by Ibn SirinYou can get an interpretation of all your dreams from a different site. The interpreter believes Seeing trees bearing abundant dates is evidence of the coming of joy and beautiful days. It is believed that dates show the dreamer’s good psychological state and the extent of his love for life. As for seeing liquid dates, it can be a sign of wealth and extreme wealth that the dreamer will achieve. If one eats dates, this It indicates profit and a lot of money that he will get from a successful business that he will do. He also saw that dates can be a sign of rain and snow, and if one sees in a dream that he is taking dates from another person, this indicates a great diet. If someone sees dating Under the ground, this indicates how willing this person is to save money. The interpreter also considers that a man who sees dates in their season is evidence that he will marry a beautiful, pure and good-natured girl, and it also indicates that he will save a lot of money. But if one sees himself shaking A palm tree, then he will travel in the near future to work hard and earn money. He also saw that dates, especially red ones, are evidence of the joy and peace of mind that God will have in his life in the future. Interpretation of a dream about dates in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi interprets seeing dates in a dream from several angles , including that seeing dates in a dream means that you will earn a lot of legitimate money and also that you will be free from pain. He also said that seeing dates on trees is a sign of happiness and freedom from stress and tension, while eating rotten red dates is evidence of diseases that afflict the fortuneteller. He believes Also, eating date skins is a sign of great wealth that the dreamer will obtain. Interpretation of a dream of dates in a dream for a married and pregnant woman. As for the interpretation of seeing dates in a dream for a pregnant and married woman in general, it includes several opinions of interpreters. The commentators unanimously agreed that if a married woman sees herself eating dates Red, this indicates the extent of her joy and happiness in her life. However, if she buys dates from the market, this is evidence of the large amount of money that the wife will earn and the extent of wealth that will affect her husband. If someone steals a date from a married woman in a dream, this means that the married woman will face many... Of problems in the coming period. As for the pregnant woman, if she sees herself eating dates, this is evidence that she will give birth to a boy. Many interpreters also saw that the dream of dates in a dream for a married woman is evidence of good and easy pregnancy and childbirth. But if the pregnant woman sees herself eating dates out of season This indicates how close the date of delivery is. But choosing black dates for the wife is a sign that her life with her husband contains difficulties and disagreements between them. The interpretation of seeing a date in a dream for a single woman is seen by most

title: Seeing a chameleon in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a chameleon in a dream for a single girl A gray chameleon appears in a dream for a single woman, indicating her ignorance of something related to her life. Seeing a red chameleon is also a warning against the mistake she wants to make, and God knows best. When a single girl sees a black chameleon in a dream, it symbolizes that she is surrounded by evil people in her life, whether her life is practical, social, or emotional, God is higher and more knowledgeable. The green chameleon symbolizes the approaching wedding date, God willing. If an unmarried woman sees a chameleon in her dream, it is a sign of cheating from a friend she deals with, and she must be very careful. But if she is attacked by a state of fear while seeing the chameleon, it symbolizes her strength with which she overcomes the fears of life and that she enjoys stability. If the chameleon is black and the girl is afraid of it, this indicates that many haters around her will overcome her and face her courageously, God willing. The death of a chameleon for unmarried women is a commendable dream, because God will keep her away from her lover. Among its characteristics are lying and hypocrisy, and these two characteristics are not suitable for a person. Killing a chameleon in a dream is a sign for her that she She will end her relationship with bad friends. If you see a blue chameleon. A rude sign because it indicates that the girl will face deprivation and need, God knows best. When an unmarried woman sees a chameleon inside the house, this is evidence of disagreements between her and one of her sisters. A chameleon attacking a virgin girl in a dream is a warning of disagreements and problems with her family. Seeing her hitting a chameleon is also a sign of her great expectation of the work that will come, and in fact, God is higher and knows everything. See also: Interpretation of a chameleon bite in a dream Interpretation of seeing a chameleon in a dream for a married woman Seeing a chameleon in a dream for a married woman is considered a sign of changes, only God knows whether the changes are bad or good. When you see a green chameleon getting married. It is a sign of the coming of livelihood, happiness and money that will cover her entire house, God willing. Slaughtering a chameleon in a dream is nothing but a good sign that worries will go away, God willing. If the chameleon eats from the leaves of the tree, this is a sign that this woman will improve her life, God willing. Instead, the chameleon is inside the woman's house and eats the food inside it. This vision is considered unfavorable and the woman should Asking for forgiveness and supplication. Eating chameleon meat in a dream for a married woman is good news for her that a happy occasion will happen to her, God willing. The cooked and cooked chameleon symbolizes the emergence of pregnancy and this kindness will permeate her life. Seeing the killing of a chameleon symbolizes death and the end of hostility between him and others. Seeing a green chameleon on a woman’s bed in her dream can be a sign of a short pregnancy period. The chameleon’s attack on her is a warning of marital strife and she must use her mind and calm things down so that they do not escalate, God knows best. If a married woman sees that the chameleon has two colors, black and blue, this is evidence of the mixing of permissible and forbidden and she must be careful. If she sees that a chameleon is hiding

title: Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for a single woman by her lover

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for a single woman with her lover Pregnancy and having children is part of the joy of life for any single girl, but seeing an unmarried woman in her dream during pregnancy is a big deal, and she is always looking for an interpretation of a vision, as was said. Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for an unmarried woman by her lover is an indication of the joy and happiness that will come in her life. If the unmarried woman sees that she is pregnant by her lover and gives birth to a beautiful male child. This indicates the strength of their relationship and that her lover has a good reputation. But if the single woman sees that she is pregnant From her lover, and that she gave birth to a boy stained with blood. This is evidence of her lover’s bad reputation and she should think carefully about getting involved with him. In the interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for an unmarried woman from her lover, if the newborn is a girl. This indicates that he will have a large and very good diet. But If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that her lover sees that she is pregnant. This is a sign of happy and enjoyable things that will soon happen to her lover. Seeing an unmarried woman pregnant with her lover a few days before the wedding indicates her anxiety and obsession with the responsibilities that await her. Interpretation of a dream of an unmarried woman who became pregnant From her lover in recent months. It appears that he is subjected to psychological pressures and life pressures that will end soon. If the single woman was in a dispute with her fiancé and saw herself pregnant last month. This is an indication of the nearness of peace between them and the removal of all consequences facing them. Some have entered into the interpretation of a dream about her lover becoming pregnant with an unmarried woman. Married. As a token that she endured the difficulties with him and helped him in all his moral and material circumstances. If you see that an unmarried woman is pregnant by her lover and that he will abort this pregnancy through surgery and abdominal opening. It means divulging secrets and revealing everything that is hidden. See also: Interpretation of dreams about swimming in the calm sea. Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for women Unmarried women in general: As for the dream of pregnancy for an unmarried woman in general, the interpreters had many opinions, among them: If an unmarried girl sees that she is pregnant by someone she knows well, this indicates that she has fallen into sin and disobedience, and many troubles have befallen her. Seeing a woman An unmarried woman pregnant by an unknown person indicates that she will get a lot of money. If an unmarried woman sees herself pregnant and cries, this is a sign that she has committed sins, and she must seek forgiveness from God Almighty. When I see an unmarried woman who is pregnant and I feel severe pain and sorrow. It indicates worries. And sorrow and problems in her life and she is working hard to get rid of them. Seeing an unmarried woman giving birth is a good sign that she will soon recover from her pain. If an unmarried woman sees that she has given birth and given birth to a man, this indicates that she is suffering from financial hardship and that she is trying to solve these difficulties. The woman A single woman who dreams of a pregnant woman with a high belly is evidence of upcoming new life changes. A single woman seeing that she is pregnant by her boss at work indicates that she will face problems with him and the possibility of her leaving her job. But if an unmarried girl sees that she is pregnant by her teacher, this is a sign of She failed her studies. So

title: Interpretation of a butterfly in a dream by Imam al-Sadiq and Ibn Sirin (the meaning of a butterfly in a dream)

preview.html: Here, dear reader, is the interpretation of a butterfly in a dream (the meaning of a butterfly in a dream). It is one of the mysterious dreams that carries within it a feeling of comfort, as the butterfly is one of the most beautiful creatures, as it appears in the spring with its wonderful shapes covered in cheerful colors such as blue, green, and pink-red. What does seeing a butterfly symbolize? A dream, is it a praiseworthy vision or a vision that never portends good or unpleasant? An encyclopedia accompanies you on a tour to learn about the meanings, connotations and symbols it carries through this article, so follow us. Interpretation of a butterfly in a dreamInterpretation of a butterfly in a dream from the point of view of the most famous dream interpretation scholars, you can find it in This article is on the encyclopedia website. For men, we will also point out an application that you can download if you want to know the interpretation of other dreams. Interpretation of a dream about a butterfly by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a butterfly in a dream. It is one of those visions that never bode well. Seeing a butterfly in a dream symbolizes changes in the dreamer’s life, for the better. Seeing a butterfly in a dream symbolizes weak enemies and that the dreamer overcomes them. Seeing a trapped butterfly in a dream indicates one’s adherence to morals and customs. Common. Seeing butterflies in a dream symbolizes flying over the dead grave, because it symbolizes goodness. And seeing butterflies flying over the orchard. It symbolizes the spread of ignorance, hatred and malice among the public. Butterflies in a dream symbolize the ignorance of youth, but seeing a butterfly landing on it is one who falls into the trap of ignorance and lack of knowledge and knowledge. Scientists in dream interpretation believe that many butterflies in a dream are those that indicate women. Women who enjoy beauty and wear fashion according to the latest trends, in addition to symbolizing wasted youth that lives without a clear goal. Seeing a butterfly in a dream is a sign of kindness and nourishment that will come to the dreamer. Dreaming of catching a butterfly in a dream indicates that he will overcome the problems and temptations that are spreading In the country. Interpretation of seeing a butterfly in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. As for seeing a butterfly in a dream that cannot fly, it indicates the presence of a weak enemy in life and cannot harm the fortuneteller because of his weakness. Many scholars believe that butterflies are colorful and happy creatures, and therefore seeing them in a dream is a sign of good health. Good and a good sign. If the butterflies move between the flowers smoothly, this means that the dreamer will see good news in the near future, God willing. If the dreamer flies butterflies and does not disturb them, this means that he is surrounded by good company that he must adhere to and they will help him in difficult situations. If he is disturbed The dreamer sees many butterflies blocking his path, which means that there are many obstacles and problems that he will face in the near future and he must behave with them well and think logically and clearly. Out of recklessness. If the butterfly dies in the dream, this indicates the death of hope and loss of passion, and the dreamer should try to add more excitement and renewal to his life. If the dreamer works in agriculture

title: Interpretation of a dream about black worms

preview.html: In our topic today, we will explain the interpretation of a dream about black worms from gptafser.com/.Interpretation of seeing black worms in a dream for one girl. Seeing a girl while she was sleeping with worms spreading in her house. The dream indicates the arrival of news or something that brings family and relatives. When I saw an unmarried girl while she was sleeping Her house was full of black worms. The vision in it indicates that the woman will be exposed to hatred, jealousy, deceit, and deception by her relatives. Therefore, the dreamer must pay attention to these relatives in her next life. Seeing a single girl in her dream of black worms. The vision indicates many things that will happen. In a girl’s life, she is happy. A single girl sees in her dream a black worm and it was small in size. The vision shows that her anxiety will go away soon, God willing. And some interpretations for an unmarried girl who saw worms, and they were black in her dream. The visions are interpreted as observing the enemy and, God willing, he will soon receive the reward. That he deserves. A girl seeing worms in her dream filling her house. Evidence that the dreamer will soon hear good news. Seeing worms of large sizes in a single girl’s dream. It indicates the presence of blessings and goodness that the girl will soon receive. A single girl seeing black worms in her dream. Seeing a girl means that you will soon suffer from envy. The vision also warns that she must be careful in the coming period of her life. In the event that an unmarried girl sees in her dream worms filling her house and the girl gets engaged. Seeing her is a sign of problems and quarrels between her and her fiancé soon. Which causes her psychological and physical fatigue, and God knows best than us. Seeing a single girl in her dream spreading worms in many ways. The dream indicates that a disreputable man will present her with a heavy character that she cannot bear. Therefore, the fortuneteller must take care of this man. See also: Interpretation of a vision Worms in a dream and their meaning in detail. Interpretation of seeing black worms in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman in her dream infected with worms. The vision shows the abundance of money and that God will give her a son who will be the reason for her happiness and get him out of the distress she is experiencing. And if the dreamer has daughters in reality. The vision shows that her daughters They will get married soon, God willing. Some commentators say that seeing a married woman in her dream, worms filling her hair. A sign of kindness, livelihood, and a lot of money, which this woman will soon have in her life. The vision also indicates that the dreamer will have children. A married woman saw black worms In her dream, he was in the house. The vision indicates the presence of problems that the family will face, and the cause will be marriage problems. The dream also indicates a lack of trust and envy. The vision also indicates problems and strife that occurred in the married woman’s home due to inheritance, and God knows best. A married woman saw worms in her dream , and they were black. The vision is a sign of goodness that the dreamer will soon enjoy. A married woman sees worms in her hair in a dream. The vision indicates that the dreamer will be exposed to a difficult test in her life. In the event that

title: The 20 most important interpretations of seeing a scorpion in a dream for a single woman, according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a scorpion in a dream for a single woman. There is a difference between a large and small scorpion. Is a black scorpion evidence of magic and envy? What about seeing yellow scorpions? All these questions revolve in the minds of girls about seeing a scorpion in a dream to know what it carries, whether good or bad, and we will tell you about the secrets of this vision through this article. Seeing a scorpion in a dream for a single woman Seeing a scorpion in a dream is a vision that carries many negative interpretations, as it is a warning. For a single girl, there is an evil lady or a cheerful friend in her life, and she must stay away from her credibility. It is said that the presence of a large scorpion in a virgin girl’s dream is an expression of a dangerous enemy, but if there is a small scorpion in the house, there is no need to be afraid. The dream here is evidence of the presence of a small scorpion that is easy to deal with and eliminate. Being stung by a scorpion in an unmarried girl’s dream, the jurists said about it: It is undesirable, and indicates that the enemies will take her, but if she is stung in the face, this is a metaphor for the serious damage that will occur. It happens to a girl. Seeing a scorpion in an unmarried woman’s dream according to Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that a scorpion in a dream for a single girl is a vision that indicates the presence of many evil-hearted or hypocritical people in the girl’s life who wish her harm, but her escape from the scorpion is for her survival. Killing the scorpion It is a very auspicious dream that indicates victory over enemies and a feeling of comfort and peace. If you see a scorpion wandering around individuals everywhere, the vision is a symbol of a person following bad ways. Ibn Sirin believes that a scorpion walking on a girl’s clothes is an expression of hatred and envy in her life, It is also a symbol of some people trying to transmit false hadiths about her and engaging in presenting them, which causes her many problems. Fear of a scorpion in a single woman’s dream: To dream of an intense fear of a scorpion in a dream for an unmarried woman, if it is in her bed, then this indicates the presence of an enemy for her among the people of the house, and she must be careful not to harm her. But if she sees a large black scorpion and is very afraid of it. This means that you have committed sin and disobedience and are afraid of the consequences of the matter. It is a symbol of mistakes in life in general. If an unmarried woman sees a scorpion chasing her and stinging her and she feels very afraid and confused, then this vision shows a woman who hates her and is hurting her on purpose, causing her many problems. Interpretation of seeing a scorpion sting In a dream for a single woman: Seeing a scorpion sting in a dream for an unmarried woman carries many clues. If it is in her bed, it means an enemy who wants to destroy her life. However, if the sting is on her left hand, it is a metaphor for many losses in the field. . From work. Dreaming of being stung by a yellow scorpion is a bad vision and indicates many obstacles that the girl faces in achieving her dream, and the vision is a metaphor for illness. Interpretation of seeing a red scorpion in a dream for a single woman. Imam Al-Sadiq believes that seeing a red scorpion in a dream for an unmarried woman is one of the loneliest visions. Which carries many connotations

title: Interpretation of seeing firewood in a dream

preview.html: Oiling firewood in a dream, and there are many interpretations given in this dream, as it is considered one of the confusing dreams, and the interpretations include between praiseworthy and undesirable, and the difference in their interpretations is based on the condition of the dreamer, as well as with the appearance of the oud in the dream being based on whether it has a good smell or scent. Foul, and many interpretation scholars have worked hard to explain it, and in this article we present to you the interpretation of a dream of staining wood in a dream. Wood oil in a dream This dream includes many interpretations, which are often evidence of goodness for the fortuneteller, in the event that the smell of the oud is good and pleasant. In a dream, and in our conversation, we explain to you the interpretation of the vision. Wood oil in a dream is also: According to what Ibn Sirin explained, seeing oil from wood. To be a sign of the medicinal qualities with which the dreamer is endowed. In addition, if someone dreams that someone gives him oud in a dream It is evidence of dominance in the matter, and good behavior among people. But if a person sees in a dream that he is putting a lot of sticks on his body. It is a sign of abandoning prayer and obligatory duties. Also, if a person dreams in a dream that he is putting a rotten stick on his body. It is a sign. However, he betrays people, and speaks ill of them in their absence. See also: Interpretation of a dream of watching television for a single and married woman in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. A dream about oud oil for a married woman, since the vision of oud oil differs in its interpretations, based on the social status of the fortuneteller, and many interpretation scholars who have tried to clarify Its interpretations, and in this context we present to you a dream about agarwood oil for a married woman is also: Seeing agarwood oil for a married woman in a dream. It is a good sign in the case of her children, and it also indicates that she will soon hear a lot of good news about them. Also, if the dreamer draws agarwood in the dream. It is evidence that she will give birth to a beautiful child soon. But if the oud is placed in the body. It is a sign that this woman is loving and kind, as she treats others with kindness and kindness. Seeing that she is buying a bottle of firewood is a sign that a married woman will enjoy prosperity and luxury of life. It also indicates The end of the poverty and distress of the situation that this woman suffers from. See also: I dreamed that I found gold and took it to the supreme interpreters for married and single women. A gift of oud oil in a dream, especially since seeing this dream is considered one of the praiseworthy visions that carry many interpretations and interpretations that are mostly positive and good and vary depending on The condition of its sightings, and therefore we explain to you in the context of the interpretation of the paragraph: Seeing a gift of agarwood oil in a dream consists of the following: Seeing a gift of firewood in a person’s dream. This dream is evidence that the dreamer will be rich in the near future, and God knows best. This person will also get rid of all financial problems. And the debts that were bothering him. Also, seeing oud as a gift to a merchant in a dream is a promising vision. Because it is evidence that he will succeed in trade, that he will expand his business, and that he will be proud of his success and progress. If the dreamer’s partner is pregnant, then oud oil in the dream is a sign

title: 15+ Interpretation of a dream about joy in a dream Meanings of joy in a dream for single people

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about joy by Ibn SirinInterpretation of dreamsJoy in a dreamIbn Sirin has evidence of a new beginning if the fortuneteller is observing joy. A person dreams of being happy, full of drums and songs, this indicates a misfortune that will befall the dreamer. A dream about the joy of an unknown person is evidence of a change in the fortuneteller’s circumstances toward The best. Seeing the presence of Farah a friend is evidence of many problems that the dreamer is exposed to. The meaning of joy in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Farah in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi is evidence that he sees the presence of Farah and everyone inside her wearing black clothes. This indicates the loss of someone close to him. The meaning of joy in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi is a sign of seeing the signing of a marriage contract. In joy, it is evidence of hearing the good news. A person dreams that he is going to joy and is planning to travel for a while. This vision is good news for obtaining a visa. A dream about joy and the appearance of some unfortunate events in it is evidence of a serious illness that the dreamer is exposed to. The meaning of seeing joy in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Seeing joy in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Seeing a woman marrying a dead man and participating in the joy is evidence of some Problems and disputes that will be presented to him in the coming period. A person dreams that he is observing the joy of one of his relatives, as this indicates a new experience and entering into many problems. The presence of a close friend’s joy is evidence of the positive changes occurring in the life of the fortuneteller. The presence of the joy of someone you do not know is evidence However, the dreamer has achieved some goals and aspirations that he has been seeking for some time. Seeing a woman happily married to a stranger is evidence of the many benefits that she will gain. A dream of joy for single people in a dream: A girl’s dream is that she brings joy and sadness, and this indicates some crises that she is going through. A girl dreams that she is attending her wedding with someone she does not know, then this portends situations that she will commit that will lead to a scandal for her. If she sees that she is enjoying her joy and rejoices in the marriage, this indicates the good morals that the husband has and she will be very happy with him. If she sees that she attended the wedding and did not She knows one of those present, this indicates some bad things that she is exposed to and that cause her some problems. The meaning of seeing a dream about joy for a married woman. A married woman dreams that she brings joy without listening to music or drums, then this indicates the happiness that she will find. Seeing the presence of joy and a lot of song and drums is evidence On the many problems that arise between her and her husband. Symbols of joy for a pregnant woman in a dream. If a pregnant woman sees that she is watching her children’s joy, this is a message to calm her down and not feel anxious about childbirth, because she will spend a good and quiet time. A pregnant woman’s dream of attending her friend’s wedding indicates a happy new life for that girl. Seeing a pregnant woman bringing joy to someone she does not know is a sign of a difficult birth that she is going through. When a pregnant woman sees her child wearing white clothes with joy, this indicates the fatigue and pain that the child is experiencing and may be the cause of his death. The concept of joy in a dream. See the presence of joy in the dream is Indicator of challenge
